# materials

**Instance Property**

The materials that define the model’s visual appearance.

## Declaration

```swift
var materials: [any Material]
```

## Discussion

Each [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MeshResource] requires a set of materials. An entity that has no materials renders using a magenta striped material. To determine the number of materials a mesh requires, use [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MeshResource/expectedMaterialCount].
title: materials
